      com.dadatoolkit.android.view中GestureDetectorBase的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  DoubleTapGestureDetector
      Better not use together with ShortPressGestureDetector, Or it'll trigger ShortPress first then DoubleTap
      class  LongPressGestureDetector 
      class  ShortPressGestureDetector
      Better not use together with DoubleTapGestureDetector, Or it'll trigger ShortPress first then DoubleTap
      class  ZoomGestureDetector

      void GestureDetectorService.onGestureRecogonized(GestureDetectorBase detector)
      One detector recogonized the gesture, stop other detector's recogonizing work.
